message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.MM, cs.AR, cs.SY 

This paper discusses a new architecture for millimeter-wave (mmWave) communication that addresses challenges such as severe path loss and channel sparsity. The paper focuses on the use of reconfigurable antennas and multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) systems. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.IT (Information Theory), which deals with the study of communication systems and their limits. Other likely sub-categories include cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture), cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.AR (Hardware Architecture), and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
